dmca.title: Warning for www.bikinibikni that your company provides hosting for
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Jen Han [mailto:Jen@ImportIcons.com] 
Posted At: Saturday, July 08, 2006 1:36 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Warning for www.bikinibikni that your company provides
hosting for
Subject: Warning for www.bikinibikni that your company provides hosting
for


It has come to our attention that one of the websites your hosting
company provides service for is uploading and sharing content in which
they do not own copyright for. 
 
My company and I have requested numerous times for the moderator of
www.bikinibikini.com  to not allow postings of our content but they
continue to keep posting and violating copyright laws.   
 
Please contact the owner of bikinibikini.com to remove the posts
 
http://www.bikinibikini.com/forum/thread43827-7.html post #62, #64, #72,
#78
 
 
 
Jen
 
CEO
Firestorm Entertainment INC.
